name: Member Status Report
report_script:
def execute(filters=None):
    filters = filters or {}
    status = filters.get("status", "Active")
    data = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT name, full_name, membership_plan, end_date, status
        FROM `tabMember`
        WHERE status=%s
    """, status, as_dict=1)

    columns = [
        {"fieldname":"name","label":"ID","fieldtype":"Link","options":"Member"},
        {"fieldname":"full_name","label":"Full Name","fieldtype":"Data","width":200},
        {"fieldname":"membership_plan","label":"Plan","fieldtype":"Data"},
        {"fieldname":"end_date","label":"End Date","fieldtype":"Date"},
        {"fieldname":"status","label":"Status","fieldtype":"Data"}
    ]

    return columns, data
